abstract: Brian Seibert reviews work by choreographer Wayne McGregor, performed by the Random Dance company, at the Alexander Kasser Theater in Montclair State University.
snippet: Wayne McGregor’s company, Random Dance, performed the American premiere of his “FAR” as part of Montclair State University’s Peak Performances series.
lead_paragraph: Wayne McGregor’s company, Random Dance, performed the American premiere of his “FAR” as part of Montclair State University’s Peak Performances series.

headline.main: Elastic Experimentalists With a Sense of Rhythm
headline.print_headline: Elastic Experimentalists With a Sense of Rhythm
headline.seo: Wayne McGregor at Montclair State University - Review
